Title: Relates to prohibiting the exclusion of coverage for losses or damages caused by exposure to lead-based paint
Summary: Relates to prohibiting the exclusion of coverage for losses or damages caused by exposure to lead-based paint; provides that no insurer licensed or permitted by the superintendent to provide liability coverage to rental property owners shall exclude coverage for losses or damages caused by exposure to lead-based paint.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to prohibiting the exclusion of coverage for losses or damages caused by exposure to lead-based paint
